column1: '''John Jethro Rashbold''' (born in [[1965]]) was a member of the [[Notion Club]].
Rashbold was an undergraduate at [[wikipedia:Magdalen College, Oxford
column2: Magdalen College]] in [[Oxford]]. He was a classical scholar and an apprentice poet, and was introduced to the Club by [[Philip Frankley]], to whom he was much attached.<ref>{{SD

column1: The name ''Rashbold'' is a play on [[J.R.R. Tolkien]]'s own surname. It is a rough translation of ''Tolkien'' (from [[wikipedia:German language
